title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Mil MI-02 - version 0.5
description:
In this video we will look at the Mil MI-02 which has been released yesterday. The helicopter is still under development but you can already fly with it. The interior of the helicopter still requires some improvements since only a small portion of the buttons are working. 

The helicopter requires AirlandFS so don't forget to download it if you didn't already have it.

If you also want to give this aircraft a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/21679/helicopter-mil-mi-2

tags: Mill MI-02 now available for MSFS 2020
